abstract: Here’s a short biography and a reading list on General Electric’s chairman, and the recently-announced chairman of President Obama’s new Council on Jobs and Competitiveness.
snippet: Here’s a short biography and a reading list on General Electric’s chairman, and the recently-announced chairman of President Obama’s new Council on Jobs and Competitiveness.
lead_paragraph: Today the chairman and chief executive of General Electric, Jeffrey R. Immelt, was named as the chairman of President Obama’s  Council on Jobs and Competitiveness. He was already serving on the President’s Economic Recovery Advisory Board under Paul A. Volcker.
